action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant on the table, the book in the refrigerator and the mop in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a orange and a banana.
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a apple and a plate.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't see a counter here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You put the plate on the counter.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a apple.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
> put potted plant on side table
You put the potted plant on the side table.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

You are in a pantry now. There are a orange, a peach, a sandwich, a freezer, a banana and a refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. The peach is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> take book from shelf
I don't see a book here.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a potted plant, a couch, a chair and a shelf. The potted plant is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You can't see a book here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a table and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there are a book and a pillow.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a apple and a book.
You can't go to a pantry from here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a potted plant, a couch, a chair and a shelf. The potted plant is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> open refrigerator
> put book in refrigerator
> close refrigerator

You are in a pantry now. There are a orange, a peach, a sandwich, a freezer, a banana and a refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. The peach is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
